title: Quality Control (QC) - E-Commerce Platform/ Nhân Viên Kiểm Duyệt Hình Ảnh Sản Phẩm (Sàn Thương Mại Điện Tử)
job_description:
Monitor and control project quality, including reviewing outputs, identifying errors, and propose corrective actions.
Provide training and guidance on project requirements and workflows.
Assist to assess the practical skills of team members/candidates.
Work closely with the team to implement improvements, ensuring compliance with defined standards and client expectations.
Prepare reports on quality metrics and additional reports as management requires.
Provide support as assigned by upper management.
Working time: 8:00 a.m - 5:50 p.m (5 days/ week)
requirements:
Strong logical and analytical thinking skills.
Detail-oriented with a focus on quality.
Basic Photoshop skills are highly advantageous, especially for tasks related to product images or content in eCommerce platforms.
Experience in crowdsourcing or eCommerce projects is an advantage.
